name: 林益辰
objective: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析等。
schedule:
Week1-3: Introduction to Statistics, Population, Sample, Fields of Stat.
Week4-6: Descriptive Stat and Inferential Stat.
Quiz-1
Week7-8: Probability and Distributions
Week9: Midterm test
week10-13: Discrete and continuous distributions
Week14-17: Estimation and Hypothesis test
Quiz-2
Week18: Final
scorePolicy:
1.平時成績（出席，上課情形學習狀況）：15%
2.Quiz：25%；
3.Mid-term：30%；
4.Final：30%。
materials:
1. Probability and Statistical Inference, Hogg, Tanis, 7e, 華泰文化
2. 基礎統計學，Statistics for management and Economics, Keller原著，劉明德....等譯
